QuestData.Title: If You're Not Against Us...
QuestData.Description: South of here you'll find a solitary tower, known as "Blackhorn's Penance." Upon it is bound a demon: Tyrus Blackhorn.$B$BYou may think me mad for turning to an old foe for help, but Blackhorn was once a mortal, and I can't imagine he wants to watch Twilight's Hammer triumph.$B$BSpeak with Blackhorn, and see if you can convince him to help us in our fight. He may yet redeem himself.$B$B...Just don't set him free!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Tyrus Blackhorn and convince him to help in the fight against the Twilight's Hammer.
QuestData.CompletionText: You were sent here to talk, $r. So. Talk.
QuestData.RewardText: Very well, $r. I will help you mortals, even from within my bonds.$B$BBut don't sicken me by claiming it's my redemption. I do this for my own ends.$B$B<Blackhorn's sudden grin is unsettling.>
